title: 玩家一退出，服务器就崩溃有什么办法解决？
author: 枯叶_听海
txt_content:
我是新手，第一次开mc服务器，准备在学校里几个同学玩。现在出现一个问题：任何一个玩家一退出，服务器就崩溃。请问有什么方法解决??服务器机子8G，内存，最大开到4G~求debug~
 以下是错误报告：


       Minecraft has crashed!      
       ----------------------      

 Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop

 A full error report has been saved to D:\Minecraft1.5.1\minecraft-生存客户端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-12_00.15.19-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



 --- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 6bfd3cf2 --------
 Full report at:
 D:\Minecraft1.5.1\minecraft-生存客户端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-12_00.15.19-server.txt
 Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

 Generated 13-5-12 上午12:15

 -- System Details --
